thread.title: 'Tollywood was a whole new experience'
thread.title_full: 'Tollywood was a whole new experience' - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: 'Tollywood was a whole new experience'
text:
VJ-turned-actress Pearle Maaney, who is making her Telugu debut through Nandini Reddy's upcoming film Kalyana Vaibhogame, says it was a whole new experience working in Tollywood.
"Unlike in Malayalam, Telugu has big budget films. So, everything is different from filmmaking to the way they approach humour. Their technical skills are much more advanced than ours," says Pearle.
However, when it comes to language, the Double Barrel actress naturally finds it easier working in Mollywood.
"But the team in Telugu made sure that I was comfortable by giving me the script in advance and supporting me in every way," she gushes. Pearle, who is also known for her biking and dancing skills, is excited to appear as an adventure freak in the movie as the role is similar to her real-life character.
The romcom will see her along with Naga Shourya and Malavika Nair. Her next Malayalam movie will be director Rojin Thomas' Jo and the Boy.
